register-data.description: Describes the the N counter latch of the PLL
register-data.name: nCounter

bit-field-data.comment: 0 ( function_FastlockEnable) | 0 (CpGain) -> CP current setting 1 permanently used 0 ( function_FastlockEnable) | 1 (CpGain) -> CP current setting 2 permanently used 1 ( function_FastlockEnable) | 0 (CpGain) -> CP current setting 1 used 1 ( function_FastlockEnable) | 1 (CpGain) -> CP current switched to settings 2 (dependant on FastLock mode)
bit-field-data.description: Read comment for more info (or datasheet)
bit-field-data.name: cpGain
